Read LINX Breakend File

Source: R/linx.R
linx_breakend_read.Rd

Reads the linx.breakend.tsv file.

linx_breakend_read(x)

Arguments

x

Path to linx.breakend.tsv file.

Value

The input file as a tibble.

Examples

x <- system.file("extdata/linx/tables/linx.breakend.tsv.gz", package = "gpgr")
(l <- linx_breakend_read(x))
#> # A tibble: 4,483 × 26
#>    id    svId  isStart gene    transcriptId canonical geneOrientation disruptive
